Interface Database

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigNeo4jDatabase, MySQLDatabase, Neo4jDatabase

    public interface Database
    The interface to represent all the methods a database object would require
    Author:
    Josh

    • Method Detail

      • checkPrerequisites

        void checkPrerequisites(java.lang.String courses)
        Checks that the CSC courses taken by a student are taken in the correct order
        Parameters:
        courses - A String of user input courses

      • getCourseCounts

        java.lang.String getCourseCounts()
        Retrieves a list/ dictionary of counts of specific types of courses e.g. number of full courses
        Parameters:
        curriculum - The list of courses the counts are queried from
        Returns:
        A list of counts to be checked against their limits

      • getMissingCourses

        boolean getMissingCourses()
        Determines if the curriculum is missing any alternate or compulsory courses
        Parameters:
        curriculum - The list of courses to be checked
        Returns:
        true if any courses are missing, false otherwise

      • checkCounts

        boolean checkCounts(java.lang.String counts)
        Determines if any course counts violate their limits
        Parameters:
        counts - a dictionary of counts to be checked/ passed to Constraint Checking tree
        Returns:
        true if all counts are in order, false otherwise

      • getSimilarCourseStudents

        java.lang.String getSimilarCourseStudents(java.lang.String minSimilarCourses)
        Retrieves a list of student numbers of students who have at least 50% the same courses in common as the user
        Parameters:
        curriculum - The list of courses to find courses in common
        minSimilarCourses - The minimum number of courses to have in common (50% of input curriculum)
        Returns:
        A list of students who are similar according to courses

      • getSimilarMarkStudents

        java.lang.String getSimilarMarkStudents(java.lang.String similarCourseStudents)
        Retrieves a list of student numbers of students who have similar marks as the user input marks
        Parameters:
        similarCourseStudents - A list of students within which to find students who are similar according to marks
        Returns:
        A list of students who are similar according to courses and marks

      • predictGrade

        void predictGrade(java.lang.String similarMarkStudents)
        Determines the average GPA and std deviation of marks of a list of students
        Parameters:
        similarMarkStudents - The list of students used to find average GPA

      • getReport

        java.lang.String getReport()
        Gets the database "report" i.e. any feedback from constraint checks & grade prediction
        Returns:

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Closes any connections to any database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
